entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 2:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
